<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Candlecap](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2332)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 151 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Pathfinder #175: Broken Tusk Moon](/Sources.aspx?ID=112) pg. 76</row>

**Price** 12 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn headwear

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The crown of a _candlecap_ is stitched leather sewn in the shape of a small bowl. Fixed inside the bowl is a melted nub of wax with a small black wick.

<document level="2" id="action-1887" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Candlecap
